00009 bool SIP_Message::isReply() {
00010     return (rline.find("SIP/2.0 ") == 0);
00011 }
00012 
00013 bool SIP_Message::isRequest() {
00014     return !isReply();
00015 }

00017 int SIP_Message::replyCode() {
00018     if (!isReply())
00019         return 0;
00020     else
00021         return atoi( rline.c_str() + 8 );
00022 }

00024 std::string SIP_Message::method() {
00025     if (!isRequest())
00026         return "";
00027     else
00028         return rline.substr(0, rline.find(" "));
00029 }

00031 std::string SIP_Message::getField(std::string name) {
00032     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = lines.begin(); iter != lines.end(); ++iter)
00033         if (getKey(*iter, ':') == name)
00034             return trim(getValue(*iter, ':'));
00035 
00036     return "";
00037 }
00038 
00039 void SIP_Message::setField(std::string name, std::string value) {
00040 
00041     for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator iter = lines.begin(); iter != lines.end(); ++iter)
00042         if (getKey(*iter, ':') == name) {
00043             *iter = name + " " + value;
00044             return;
00045         }
00046 
00047     lines.push_back( name + " " + value );
00048 }
00049 
00050 SIP_Message::SIP_Message( char *buf, int len ) {
00051 
00052     buf[len] = '\000';
00053 
00054     std::string packet(buf);
00055 
00056     rline = packet.substr( 0, packet.find("\015\012") );
00057     packet = packet.substr( packet.find("\015\012") + 2 );
00058 
00059     std::string nextline;
00060 
00061     while (packet.find("\015\012") != std::string::npos) {
00062         nextline = packet.substr( 0, packet.find("\015\012") );
00063 
00064         if (nextline.length() == 0)
00065             break;
00066 
00067         if (getKey(nextline, ':') == "Via")
00068             via.push_back(nextline);
00069         else
00070             lines.push_back(nextline);
00071 
00072         packet = packet.substr( packet.find("\015\012") + 2 );
00073     }
00074 
00075     if (packet.length() > 0)
00076         body = packet;
00077 }

00079 SIP_Authentication SIP_Message::getAuthentication() {
00080 
00081     SIP_Authentication result;
00082     std::string s = getField("WWW-Authenticate");
00083     std::vector<std::string> v = split(s, ' ');
00084 
00085     if (v.size() != 2)
00086         return result;
00087 
00088     std::vector<std::string> u = split(v[1], ',');
00089 
00090     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < u.size(); ++i) {
00091         std::string k = getKey(u[i]);
00092         std::string v = trim(getValue(u[i]), '\"');
00093         if (k == "realm")
00094             result.realm = v;
00095         else if (k == "algorithm")
00096             result.algorithm = v;
00097         else if (k == "nonce")
00098             result.nonce = v;
00099     }
00100 
00101     return result;
00102 }
00103

00109

00111         return result;

00114

00116         std::string k = getKey(u[i]);

00118         if (k == "realm")

00129 std::string SIP_Message::toStream() {
00130     std::string result = rline + "\015\012";
00131 
00132     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = via.begin(); iter != via.end(); ++iter)
00133         result += *iter + "\015\012";
00134 
00135     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = lines.begin(); iter != lines.end(); ++iter)
00136         result += *iter + "\015\012";
00137 
00138     result += "\015\012";
00139 
00140     if (body.length() > 0) result += body;
00141 
00142     return result;
00143 }

00145 std::string SIP_Message::getSdpAddress() {
00146 
00147     std::vector<std::string> l = split(body, '\n');
00148 
00149     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = l.begin(); iter != l.end(); ++iter) {
00150         std::string s = trim(*iter, '\015');
00151         if (getKey(s, '=') == "o")
00152             return split(s, ' ').back();
00153     }
00154 
00155     return "0.0.0.0";
00156 
00157 }
00158 
00159 std::string SIP_Message::getSdpPort() {
00160 
00161     std::vector<std::string> l = split(body, '\n');
00162 
00163     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = l.begin(); iter != l.end(); ++iter)
00164         if (getKey(*iter, '=') == "m")
00165             return split(*iter, ' ').at(1);
00166 
00167     return "0";
00168 
00169 }

00171 std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & out, const SIP_Message & m) {
00172 
00173     out << m.rline << std::endl;
00174 
00175     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = m.via.begin(); iter != m.via.end(); ++iter)
00176         out << *iter << std::endl;
00177 
00178     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = m.lines.begin(); iter != m.lines.end(); ++iter)
00179         out << *iter << std::endl;
00180 
00181     if (m.body.length() > 0) out << m.body << std::endl;
00182 
00183     return out;
00184 }
